records.location_details: On board an aircraft during a return operation from Austria to Nigeria and Gambia. The incident occurred when two escort officers were injured by a Gambian returnee.
records.where_clear: On board an aircraft in international airspace during a return operation from Austria to Nigeria and Gambia.
records.location_text_raw: On board of aircraft during return ops from Austria and Nigeria/Gambia
records.country_or_area: International airspace / between Austria, Nigeria, Gambia
records.uncertainty_note: Location is an aircraft in transit between multiple countries, specific coordinates unknown and explicitly stated as unknown in the report.
records.context_note: During a Joint Return Operation (JRO) led by Austria, two escort officers were injured (bitten) by a Gambian returnee due to aggressive behavior on the flight. The JRO involved 34 returnees (28 Nigerian, 6 Gambian) and participation from Belgium, Bulgaria, Switzerland, France, Luxembourg, Hungary, Germany, and Sweden.
records.evidence_quote: Two officers injured during Join Return Operation
